After you have finished your downstream analyses, you will want to visualize your results.

`R` has a powefull package, called [ggplot](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org) that is very versatile. We work with it a lot, so we will present it to you today.

In order to understand better the possibilities of ggplot, we are going to try them out in this [tutorial](https://nbisweden.github.io/raukr-2023/labs/ggplot/) from Roy Francis at NBIS.
